sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"急切的，渴望的"之意。
means: anxious ：强调因忧虑、关注或害怕而产生的急切心情。
eager ：侧重于急于成功的迫切心情。
keen ：强调因兴趣强烈或欲望而急于做某事。

sentence.Network_en: I believe he is most painfully anxious about Diana.
sentence.Network_cn: 我相信他肯定非常担心黛安娜。

sentence.Network_en: They were anxious to bring the washing in before it rained.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们急于在下雨前把洗好的衣服收进屋子。

sentence.Network_en: The Government is anxious to keep the whole case out of court.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府迫切希望整件事能够在庭外解决。

英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... anxiety-ridden 忧心忡忡的 anxious seat 焦急不安 anxious 观念的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin anxius (from angere 'to choke') + -ous

entry.def: If you are anxious to do something or anxious that something should happen, you very much want to do it or very much want it to happen.

example.ex: Both the Americans and the Russians are anxious to avoid conflict in South Asia...
example.tran: 美国人和俄罗斯人都迫切希望避免在南亚发生冲突。

example.ex: He is anxious that there should be no delay...
example.tran: 他非常希望不会出现延误。

entry.def: If you are anxious, you are nervous or worried about something.

example.ex: The foreign minister admitted he was still anxious about the situation in the country...
example.tran: 外交部长承认对于该国的局势他仍然颇感忧虑。

example.ex: A friend of mine is a very anxious person.
example.tran: 我的一个朋友是个非常容易焦虑不安的人。

entry.tran: （时间或局势）紧张的，令人焦虑的，让人担忧的
entry.def: An anxious time or situation is one during which you feel nervous and worried.

example.ex: The Prime Minister faces anxious hours before the votes are counted tomorrow night.
example.tran: 在明晚计票完成之前，首相将面临数小时的煎熬等待。

means.word_mean: 1. mentally upset over possible misfortune or danger etc; worried;

sentences.sentence: "not used to a city and anxious about small things"
"anxious to see the new show at the museum"

means.word_mean: 3. causing or fraught with or showing anxiety;

sentences.sentence: "spent an anxious night waiting for the test results"

auth_sentence.content: Users can become anxious, suspicious and even paranoid.
auth_sentence.res_content: Users can become anxious, suspicious and even paranoid.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Users can become anxious, suspicious and even paranoid.

auth_sentence.content: Yet he has an anxious eye toward the exit.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet he has an anxious eye toward the exit.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yet he has an anxious eye toward the exit.

auth_sentence.content: Was anyone ever more anxious than we are today?
auth_sentence.res_content: Was anyone ever more anxious than we are today?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Was anyone ever more anxious than we are today?

stems_affixes.value_cn: 担忧的, 渴望的;焦急的
忧虑, 焦急, 渴望, 热望
stems_affixes.word_buile: anxi焦急+ety状态→n.忧虑, 焦急, 渴望, 热望

Sentence.sentence: A number of innovative colleges are making the same offer to students anxious about saving time and money.
Some argue that people are anxious and feel threatened by an inflow of new workers.

means.word_mean: 焦急的, 忧虑的, 担心的

sentences.en: We had a very anxious time until we knew that they were safe.
sentences.cn: 我们一直忧虑直到得知他们平安。

sentences.en: We are anxious that he should listen to our advice.
sentences.cn: 我们担心他是否能听从我们的劝告。

means.word_mean: 渴望的, 急切的, 非常希望

sentences.en: They are really anxious for peace.
I was anxious for everything to be settled.
sentences.cn: 我渴望每一件事都安排妥当。

jushi.english: You must have had an anxious day.
jushi.chinese: 你一定度过了一个焦虑不安的一天。

jushi.english: The week of the flood was an anxious time for all of us.
jushi.chinese: 对我们来说,发洪水的一周是十分令人焦虑的一段时间。

jushi.english: His poor health has been a very anxious business.
jushi.chinese: 他身体不好使人很担心。
